question.text: Which mixture of the solutions will lead to the formation of negatively charged colloidal <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow></mfenced><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> sol?

options.text: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>0</mn><mo>.5</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

<math><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

<math><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>1.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

<math><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>0.1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>0.1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math>

solution.text:
The common ion between the colloidal particles and the remaining solution gets adsorbed on the surface of the colloidal particles and thus the particles acquire charge.

Formation of negatively charged colloidal [AgI]I- sol:

50 ml of 1 M AgNO3+50 ml  2.0 M KI

Millimoles of Ag+=50×1 m=50 m moles

Millimoles of I-=50×2=100 m  moles

nI->nAg+

∴ it will form negatively charged solution.
[AgI/I-]
